caption.p: The distribution of freshwater ( dark green areas), intermediate ( light green areas), brackish ( light purple areas), and saline ( dark purple areas) marshes in the study area—four major basins in Louisiana, USA, at the northern Gulf of Mexico, that is, the Barataria, the Breton Sound, the Pontchartrain, and the Terrebonne basins—in 1988 (Panel a) and 2013 (Panel b). The locations of the Grand Isle station, the New Orleans Airport station, and the St. Mary's Point station are also shown ( yellow crosses) in Panel b
